transportAdvice: Valencia has a well-developed public transit network including metro, bus, and tram lines that connect the city centre, beach areas, and major tourist attractions. The historic centre is very walkable, and taxis are widely available throughout the city.

weather.description: Cool and mild winter days with occasional rain showers; comfortable for sightseeing but bring a light jacket.
Still cool but gradually brightening, with a mix of sunny spells and occasional rain.
Spring begins with warming temperatures and longer days, though showers remain possible.
Pleasant spring weather with mild temperatures and a good balance of sun and cloud.
Warm and mostly sunny, ideal for outdoor activities and beach visits.
Hot and dry with long sunny days; beach season is well underway.
Peak summer heat with very little rain; expect crowded beaches and lively evenings.
Hot and humid with intense sunshine; the sea is warm and beach crowds are at their highest.

Mild and pleasant with more frequent rain; a quieter time to explore the city.

Cool winter weather with festive atmosphere in the city; rain is possible but sunny days still occur.
